amendment.description: Amendment grants students with intellectual disabilities access to Federal work study funds for enrollment in comprehensive post-secondary educational programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in House Report 109-399 to allow students with intellectual disabilities (mental retardation) access to Federal work-study funds for enrollment in comprehensive post-secondary education programs that improve students' academic and personal skills, independence, and employability.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
